markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Trespass Teleportation](/Feats.aspx?ID=3726) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 47</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Exploit Vulnerability](/Actions.aspx?ID=1227)

**Trigger**
The target of your Exploit Vulnerability is within 120 feet and uses a [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156) effect.

**Requirements**
You are benefiting from Exploit Vulnerability.

</column>

---

You can hunt your foe to the ends of creation. You teleport along with the enemy, appearing the same direction and distance from it as you were before it teleported (or the nearest unoccupied space if your destination is occupied). Any allies affected by [Share Weakness](/Feats.aspx?ID=3717) or [Ubiquitous Weakness](/Feats.aspx?ID=3733), if you have those abilities, can spend their reaction to teleport along with the enemy if they're within 120 of the enemy and choose to do so.
name: Trespass Teleportation
requirement: You are benefiting from Exploit Vulnerability.
requirement_markdown: You are benefiting from Exploit Vulnerability.
